Новый выпуск Counter-Strike едва ли изменил традициям. У него есть все шансы понравиться той аудитории, которую еще не проглотили «кумиры молодежи» Battlefield 3 и Modern Warfare 3. А что до ветеранов — те еще успеют привыкнуть.

For nearly 1.2k hours, I have suffered. 
Suffered in a sense of me failing to do what needs to be done,
Suffered in a sense of others being retarded enough to stay in SIlver,
Suffered in a sense of me starting to hate a certain country because of how toxic their community is, 

And suffered in a sense that this game is completely full of salt and cancer. 

It's addictive, it's fun,




But that only happens at the start, In the end, you need friends to match with you to actually "HAVE FUN".
